author: Orci
title: Great Set to get a fig and parts very cheap !
review:
Hello,
I bought this set some hours again 10 times for only 20 Euros !
I like the fig and the wagon and  the wagon has some rare parts (gold, dark green).
In this set is a torch, a sword and three spears,
all in all its very much for 2 Euros and in the battlepack costs a fig more than 2 Euros, so I think that this set is brilliant if you want to form an army !

author: Ernst
title: A collectors item with a fiercefull weapon.
review:
Overall 4 bricks : Not a must-have set but valuable if you collect the Kingdoms theme. The set is promotional and origionally brought out only in Germany, advantage of a set this size you always can collect the parts and make it yourself but I wanted the real thing. Its a nice set with a Dragon Knight and a fierce attack cart, not spectacular but good enough for 4 bricks.

 

Building 3 bricks : Nothing really difficult, the cart is a bit like its predecessors so easy to built. The cart with weapons is very realistic.

 

Parts 5 bricks : A set filled with usefull parts, a lot of weapons, a torch and a good minifigure. Simply very good for a small set.

 

Playability 4 bricks : Standing alone not much fun, but these kind of sets are there to add to your other sets and then it has sufficient playing value.

 

Value 4 bricks : hard to say since it never was for sale and Bricklink shows no used estimate for this set yet. I bought it for â‚¬8,00 including sending, in my opinion a reasonable price for a MISB set of this size which hasn't been for sale. The average MISB price on Bricklink is the same.
